content.question: In their works Pisupa Lua Afe (Corned Beef 2000) and Trade (Gifts for Trading Land with White People), Michel Tuffery and Jaune Quick-to-See Smith incorporate everyday items primarily in order to

choices.label: explore the aesthetic qualities of ordinary objects
criticize the economic impact of modern consumerism
comment on the legacy of colonialism

content.answer: comment on the legacy of colonialism

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
